cards.name: TMF/A-802 BuCUE
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Linear Cannons; 1 Beam Sabers.
wargear: This model’s Linear Cannons can be replaced with 1 Missile Pod.

abilities.name: High Speed Transformation
abilities.description: At the beginning of each of your Command phases, this unit may choose to enter a High Speed Form.  Until your next Command phase, each ranged weapon equipped by this model gains the [Assault] keyword and reduce the number of attacks by 1.

abilities.name: Jet Engines
abilities.description: Each time this unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this unit.

other.name: Squad Tactics
other.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, and there is a ZAFT BATTLELINE TMF/A-802 BuCUE unit within 6" of this model, reroll a hit roll of 1.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

cards.name: Martin DaCosta
composition: 1 Martin DaCosta in a TMF/A-802 BuCUE
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Linear Cannons; 1 Beam Sabers.
wargear: This model’s Linear Cannons can be replaced with 1 Missile Pod.

abilities.name: High Speed Transformation
abilities.description: At the beginning of each of your Command phases, this unit may choose to enter a High Speed Form.  Until your next Command phase, each ranged weapon equipped by this model gains the [Assault] keyword and reduce the number of attacks by 1.

abilities.name: Jet Engines

other.name: BuCUE Leader
other.description: While this model is within 6" of one or more other friendly ZAFT TMF/A-802 BuCUE units, this model has the [Lone Operative] ability.

cards.name: Andrew Waltfeld
composition: 1 Andrew Waltfeld in a TMF/A-803 LaGOWE
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Beam Cannons; 1 Beam Fangs.

abilities.name: Beam Cannons
abilities.description: When targeting a Vehicle or a Monster, attacks from this weapon score Critical Wounds on a 5+.

abilities.name: High Speed Transformation
abilities.description: At the beginning of each of your Command phases, this unit may choose to enter a High Speed Form.  Until your next Command phase, each ranged weapon equipped by this model gains the [Assault] keyword and reduce the Ballistic Skill by 1.

abilities.description: Each time this unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this unit.

other.name: BuCUE Leader
other.description: While this model is within 6" of one or more other friendly ZAFT TMF/A-802 BuCUE units, this model has the [ Lone Operative ] ability.

other.name: Ace
other.description: Once per phase, you can re-roll one Hit roll, one Wound roll or one saving throw made for this model.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-6 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Machine Gun; 1 Heavy Sword.
wargear: This model’s Machine Gun can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 Bazooka ◦ 1 Beam Cannon ◦ 1 Heavy Missiles
This model may be equipped with 1 Leg Missiles.

other.name: BST Pack
other.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, this unit can make a Normal move. If it does so, until the end of the turn, this unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Beam Rifle; 1 Beam Saber.
wargear: This model can be equipped with 1 [Assault Shroud] unit.

other.name: Hair Trigger

cards.name: Dearka Elsman
composition: 1 Dearka Elsman in a GAT-X103 Buster Gundam
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Beam Cannon; 1 Missile Launchers; 1 Railcannon; 1 Titanic Feet.

wargear.name: Beam Cannon
wargear.description: When targeting a Vehicle or a Monster, attacks from this weapon score Critical Wounds on a 5+.

abilities.name: Note
abilities.description: When firing the Beam Cannon in launcher mode, this model may not fire the Railcannon in either mode.  Likewise, when firing the Railcannon in shotgun mode, this model may not fire the Beam Cannon in either mode.

other.name: Fire Support
other.description: Each time this model Remains Stationary, until the start of your next Movement phase, ranged weapons equipped this model have the [Ignores Cover] ability.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Assault Shroud
abilities.description: If you have upgraded a model to have an [Assault Shroud] unit, attach the appropriate [Assault Shroud] unit to your model as a reminder. These do not count as models for any rules purposes.  Increase the base cost of that model by the cost of this unit.

abilities.name: Duel Assault Shroud
abilities.description: Increase this model's W to 30, T to 7, and Invulnerable Save to 4+.

abilities.name: Wargear
abilities.description: This model gains the following wargear: 1 Missile Launchers; 1 Railcannon.
